intro.tips2.message: You need to have an account to use UClass. If you don’t have an one,

intro.params1.message:
UClass Smart Classroom brings you a completely new experience of blended teaching and learning. It combines online and face-to-face teaching/learning and but is more effective than the traditional face-to-face teaching/learning. UClass supports a seamless online/face to face learning environment and enhances student participation.
  • Online and face-face classroom teaching/learning are seamlessly integrated.
  • Multi-screen interconnection eliminates the distance between learners and teachers.
  • Data-based teaching improves the teaching efficiency.
  • AI ability reduces the workload of teachers.
  • Remote, real-time interaction and collaboration promote effective communication.
  • Use whiteboards for face to face and virtual collaboration.
  • The session data report provides a comprehensive analysis of the classroom activities conducted during the session.
We are currently serving more than 400 educational organizations and 2 million users worldwide.

intro.params2.message: UClass Smart Classroom - Cutting-edge technology makes teaching/learning unlimited and smart.

faultDetect.msg18.message: If there are other problems, it is recommended to shut down and then start UClass, and the service will be restarted.

faultDetect.msg19.message: What should I do if the group screen is offline or cannot receive the broadcast screen?

faultDetect.msg20.message: Check if UClass of the group screen is running

faultDetect.msg21.message: Make sure UClass of the group screen is running. When UClass is not turned on or is running in the background, the broadcast of the teacher screen cannot be received.

faultDetect.msg22.message: You can try to shut down and then start UClass of the group screen. It will try to reconnect to the teacher screen, and the connection will take around 10 seconds.

faultDetect.msg23.message: View how to shut down/start UClass

faultDetect.msg24.message: The teacher screen attempts to end and then re-open the relevant feature/activity

faultDetect.msg25.message: When UClass of the group screen is running normally and the teacher screen is attempting to end and then re-open a feature/activity such as the screen broadcast, group comparison, etc., the system will try to reconnect the group screen.

faultDetect.msg26.message: You can try to shut down and then start UClass on the teacher screen, and the service will restart.

faultDetect.msg27.message: Check if the network connection/IP address of the group screen is correct

faultDetect.msg28.message: Check whether the current IP is the same as the IP address pre-assigned to the screen on the lower left corner of the group screen

faultDetect.msg30.message: If you still cannot solve the problem after following the instructions here, please seek help from your school's IT helpdesk.

faultDetect.msg46.message: Click the icon to return to the home screen, and then click the Close icon in the upper right corner to shut down UClass.
